text:
Hint: the clue is the word ‘overdosed’ so when taking #chloroquine as prescribed, there is little to know risk and has been used since 1955 when the FDA approved it.

So why did @CNN report this?

#ICYMI: the study by Dr. Roy Spencer of UAB Huntsville, AL: https://t.co/Zbev5CvhLl https://t.co/zW5F1CgKKT
